attributes.action: Independent and full disclosure of what the covid-19 vaccine contains.
attributes.additional_details: It is a basic human right to know what is going into your body and how it is manufactured. We want the government to disclose independently the production of the vaccine.
attributes.background: People across the country and across the world are worried by exactly what the vaccine is and what does it contain. We check the ingredients on our food and read extensive pamphlets for our medicine. How does the government expect people to just take this vaccine?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. This information has already been published.

The ingredients list for the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine is available here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/948518/Information_for_UK_recipients_on_PfizerBioNTech.pdf

The ingredients list for the Astra Zeneca (Oxford) Covid19 Vaccine is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/regulatory-approval-of-covid-19-vaccine-astrazeneca/information-for-uk-recipients-on-covid-19-vaccine-astrazeneca

The ingredients list for the Moderna Vaccine is available here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/regulatory-approval-of-covid-19-vaccine-moderna
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
